accounts.title: Minecraft Accounts
accounts.account_not_found: Could not find the selected account
accounts.account_corrupted: The account might have been deleted or corrupted
accounts.logout_warning: If you log out now the launcher will restart.

java.ram_info: Configure the amount of RAM memory that the game will use
java.java_path_info: Select the location of Java on your system
java.java_cleanup_confirm: Are you sure you want to clean unused Java installations?
java.java_cleanup_info: This action will remove Java versions that haven't been used recently, freeing up disk space.
java.java_cleanup_warning: Versions will be automatically re-downloaded when needed.
java.java_game_warning: There is a game currently running using Java. Cleanup is blocked to prevent issues with the ongoing game.
java.info:
To run Minecraft, the launcher automatically downloads the compatible Java version for each Minecraft version and stores it in the 'runtime' folder.
However, you can select your own custom Java version if you prefer.

ðŸ’¡ Automatic Management:
â€¢ Java 8: Minecraft 1.7 - 1.16.5
â€¢ Java 17: Minecraft 1.17 - 1.20.6
â€¢ Java 21: Minecraft 1.21+
java.java_path_launcher: Use the Java version provided by the launcher
java.java_management_info: The launcher automatically downloads the compatible Java version for each Minecraft version. Installations are stored in the 'runtime' folder and reused automatically.
java.java_no_versions_installed: There are no Java installations, the launcher will automatically download the necessary Java version when starting the game.

game.resolution_info:
Set the resolution for the game that fits your screen. By default, the game starts at 854 x 480.
You can modify this value to achieve optimal gameplay comfort. The ideal resolution is 1280 x 720.

launcher_settings.close_all: Close the game and the launcher when closing the launcher
launcher_settings.performance_mode_restart: To fully apply performance mode changes, it is necessary to restart the launcher. This will remove all transitions and visual effects to improve performance.
launcher_settings.performance_mode_restart_confirm: Do you want to restart the launcher now?
launcher_settings.language_change_message: The language has been changed. Some changes may require restarting the application.
launcher_settings.reset_config_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all launcher configuration?
launcher_settings.reset_config_warning: This action cannot be undone and the launcher will restart. Game files (assets, libraries, instances) will not be deleted.
launcher_settings.delete_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete ALL launcher data?
launcher_settings.delete_all_warning: This action will completely delete all launcher data, including accounts, configurations, assets, libraries, instances and game files. This action cannot be undone.
launcher_settings.delete_assets_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all game assets?
launcher_settings.delete_assets_warning: This action will delete all downloaded asset files and all saved configurations within the game. This action cannot be undone.
launcher_settings.data_managemnt_info: These options allow you to reset the configuration or delete all launcher data. Use them with caution.
launcher_settings.performance_mode_info: Performance mode disables video backgrounds and visual transitions to reduce resource consumption.
launcher_settings.download_info: Maximum number of files that can be downloaded simultaneously. A higher number can speed up downloads but may also cause issues on slow connections.
launcher_settings.data_management_info: These options allow you to reset the configuration or delete all launcher data. Use them with caution.
launcher_settings.behavior_info: Configure how the launcher behaves when starting the game. You can choose to close or minimize the launcher, or keep it open.
launcher_settings.dev_tools_info: Useful tools for diagnosis and development.
launcher_settings.language_info: Select the language for the launcher interface. Changes will be applied immediately.

info_tab.terms_error: There has been an error loading the terms of service. Please try again later.

login.protected_account_info: This account is protected and cannot be used on this device. Please contact the administrator if you think this is an error.
login.user_with_space: Your username should not contain spaces
login.truncated_username_info: Your username was too long and has been truncated to:
login.truncated_username_confirm: Do you want to continue with this name?
login.error_creating_account: An error occurred while creating the offline account. Please try again.

home.no_instances_contact: Contact an administrator or use the + button to add an instance with code.
home.no_instances_account: No instances available for your account
home.error_message: If you're reading this, something very bad is happening.
home.store_offline: It seems the store is not online. Hiding store section.
home.store_disabled: The store is disabled. Hiding store section...
home.hwid_blocked: A device block has been detected. You will not be able to start any instance until your device is unblocked.
home.hwid_blocked_error: A HWID block has been detected. Cannot start any instance.
home.hwid_blocked_ticket: If you think this is an error, open a ticket on the Miguelki Network discord.
home.anticheat_error: Could not connect to the Miguelki Network Anticheat and therefore no instance can be played.
home.anticheat_verify_error: The anticheat could not verify the integrity of your device and therefore no instance can be played.
home.instance_no_permission: You don't have permission to start this instance.
home.instance_not_found_message: The instance no longer exists on the server.
home.instance_update_list: Do you want to update the list of available instances?
home.update_error_message: Could not update the instance list
home.queue_error_message: An error occurred while connecting to the queue system. Please try again later.
home.connection_error_message: Could not connect to the assets server.
home.connection_suggestions: Check your internet connection, the server may be temporarily unavailable, try again in a few minutes
home.insufficient_space_message: There is not enough disk space to download the assets.
home.insufficient_space_suggestions: Free up space on your hard drive, verify that you have at least 2GB free
home.permission_error_message: No permissions to write to the destination folder.
home.permission_error_suggestions: Run the launcher as administrator, verify launcher folder permissions
home.timeout_error_suggestions: Your connection may be slow, try again, consider using a more stable connection
home.assets_not_found_message: The assets for this instance are not available.
home.assets_not_found_suggestions: Contact the server administrator, verify that the instance is configured correctly
home.loader_config_error_message: Could not configure the loader for Minecraft
home.version_not_available_suggestions: Verify that the loader supports the Minecraft version, contact the server administrator
home.close_game_confirmation: Are you sure you want to close the current game? All unsaved progress will be lost.
home.closing_game_info: Please wait while the game is closing...
home.game_closed_info: The game has been closed successfully
home.game_closed_error: Could not close the game. Please close it manually.
home.add_instance_info: Enter an instance code provided by an administrator to add the instance. The entered code will be assigned to the currently selected account.

messages.contact_support: Contact support if the problem persists

errors.contact_support: Contact support if the problem persists

setup.welcome_message: Welcome! Let's configure some parameters to optimize your experience.
setup.performance_info: Enable this option to improve performance on low-resource systems.
setup.memory_info: Configure the amount of RAM memory that the game can use
setup.performance_note: This option disables animated video backgrounds and visual transitions to reduce resource consumption.
setup.launcher_behavior: Select how you want the launcher to behave when starting the game:
setup.close_launcher: Close the launcher after starting the game (Recommended)
setup.close_all: Close the game and the launcher when closing the launcher
setup.step_0: Select the language of the launcher
setup.language_info: Choose the language you prefer for the launcher interface. Changes will be applied immediately.

notifications.language_changed: Language changed. Some changes will require restarting the application.

mods.title: Mods
mods.no_mods: There are no optional mods available for this client.

skins.title: Skins
skins.no_skins_upload: No saved skins. Upload your first skin.
skins.delete_skin_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the skin
skins.upload_too_large: File is too large. Maximum allowed size is 1MB.
skins.upload_same_name: A skin with the same name already exists. Please choose another name.
skins.upload_size_error: Skin dimensions must be 64x64 or 64x32 pixels.
skins.upload_invalid_file: The file is not a valid image.
skins.skin_name_description: Enter a name for the skin (max. 16 characters):
skins.skin_name_tip: The name will help identify your skin in the library.
skins.xbox_requirement: Only Xbox/Microsoft accounts can change skins.
skins.apply_success: Skin successfully applied to your Minecraft account!

mklib.report_thanks: Thank you very much for sending the performance report! We will investigate the issue as soon as possible.
mklib.report_error_info: An error occurred while sending the performance report. Please try again later or contact support.
mklib.ban_game_termination_info: The client has been closed because the device has been banned.
mklib.support_game_termination_info: The support team has closed your instance.
mklib.support_config_deletion_info: The support team is resetting the launcher configuration. The launcher will restart automatically in a few moments.
mklib.support_data_deletion_info: The support team is deleting all launcher data. The launcher will restart automatically in a few moments.
mklib.support_capture_info: The support team is taking a screenshot of the application to help diagnose issues.
mklib.report_prompt_info:
If you are experiencing problems with the launcher, you can send a performance report to help us solve the issue.

Do you want to send a performance report?
mklib.patch_toolkit_prompt_info:
The Patch Toolkit is an advanced tool that allows solving problems when running the game.
Run this tool ONLY if you have problems starting the game.
Do you want to run the Patch Toolkit?
If so, it will automatically download and patch the game.

terms.title: Welcome to the launcher
terms.content: Before continuing, please accept the terms and conditions to use the software. Otherwise, the launcher will close and you will not be able to use it until you accept them.

verification.discord_authentication_error_info:
Could not verify Discord session.

Do you want to try again?
verification.discord_verification_error_info:
Could not verify Discord account.

Do you want to try again?
verification.discord_verification_info:
To access the launcher you must log in with your Discord account and be on the server.

Do you want to log in now?
verification.discord_membership_error_info:
Could not verify membership on the Discord server.

Do you want to try again?
verification.discord_membership_missing_with_invite:
You are not detected as a member of the Discord server. To use the launcher you must be a server member.

Do you want to join now? A window will open in your browser.
verification.discord_membership_missing:
You are not detected as a member of the Discord server. To use the launcher you must be a server member.

Do you want to restart the verification system?
